translations: 使成三倍（trebled 是 treble 的过去分词、过去式）

sentences.sentence: He trebled his earnings in two years.
sentences.translation: 他在两年间收入增加了两倍。

sentences.sentence: Cases of food poisoning have trebled in the last two years.
sentences.translation: 在过去的两年里，食物中毒事件增加了两倍。

sentences.sentence: By 2050, if nothing changes, that number will have trebled.
sentences.translation: 如果情况没有改变，那么到了2050年这个数字将会翻3倍。
